dataQuery.sqlStatement: select REQUISITION_header_id HEADER_ID ,SEGMENT1 ,HOU.NAME ORGANIZATION_NAME ,PRHA.AUTHORIZATION_STATUS STATUS from po_requisition_headers_all prha ,HR_OPERATING_UNITS HOU WHERE 1=1 AND PRHA.ORG_ID=HOU.ORGANIZATION_ID and PRHA.ORG_ID=204 AND PRHA.SEGMENT1 IN('15907','1707','15904')

SELECT PRLA.REQUISITION_LINE_ID ,PRLA.LINE_NUM ,MSIB.SEGMENT1 ITEM_NAME ,PRLA.QUANTITY ,PRLA.UNIT_PRICE ,PRLA.UNIT_PRICE*QUANTITY AMOUNT FROM po_requisition_lines_all PRLA ,MTL_SYSTEM_ITEMS_B MSIB WHERE 1=1 AND PRLA.ITEM_ID=MSIB.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID AND PRLA.DESTINATION_ORGANIZATION_ID=MSIB.ORGANIZATION_ID AND REQUISITION_header_id IN (531791,535792,11669)
